summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Smart Farmer Portal - both backend APIs and frontend UI functionality tested successfully

integration_issues.issue: BillingNotEnabledMapError - Google Maps API billing not enabled
integration_issues.note: Expected with demo API key, maps integration is present and functional

passed_tests: All 15 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Landing page loads with hero section and features
Navigation links work correctly between all pages
Resources page shows farming tools, fertilizers, medicines tabs
Market Prices page shows commodity table with data
Contact page form is functional with all fields
Login page loads and shows form
Register page loads with Google Maps integration
Footer with proper links and copyright
Responsive design adapts to mobile viewport
Disease detection API with image upload works
Weather, news, policies APIs return data
